Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, the game show|where you're a giant dice, for some reason.||{angry}And the reason is: because I said so!
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, the game show|where you're a giant dice, for some reason.||{angry}And the reason is: because I said so!

Introduction: Let's take a moment to say thank you to our|generous sponsor, endless misery!
Introduction_uk: Let's take a moment to say thank you to our|generous sponsor, endless misery!

Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, where you risk it|all to win your heart's desire!
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, where you risk it|all to win your heart's desire!

Introduction: Time for another round of Dicey Dungeons, where|the fun never stops.||{sly}Just like our contestants, who are|trapped here for ever!
Introduction_uk: Time for another round of Dicey Dungeons, where|the fun never stops.||{sly}Just like our contestants, who are|trapped here for ever!

Introduction: Time for another episode of Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}It's the only game show where contestants|can win, or lose, literally anything!
Introduction_uk: Time for another episode of Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}It's the only game show where contestants|can win, or lose, literally anything!

Introduction: Welcome back to the longest-running game show|on Earth, predating humanity by...||{thinking}...I mean, I don't know how long, we didn't have|calendars back then.||{normal}A while!
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to the longest-running game show|on Earth, predating humanity by...||{thinking}...I mean, I don't know how long, we didn't have|calendars back then.||{normal}A while!

Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Let the good times roll!
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Let the good times roll!

Introduction: Time to get moving - a rolling dice gathers no moss!
Introduction_uk: Time to get moving - a rolling dice gathers no moss!

Introduction: It's time to rock and roll!||{thinking}Mostly roll, to be honest, unless our contestant|meets the Bully.
Introduction_uk: It's time to rock and roll!||{thinking}Mostly roll, to be honest, unless our contestant|meets the Bully.

Introduction: Let's welcome our latest contestant back to|Dicey Dungeons!||{thinking}Tell me, do you remember sunlight?||{sly}Then you're not trying hard enough!
Introduction_uk: Let's welcome our latest contestant back to|Dicey Dungeons!||{thinking}Tell me, do you remember sunlight?||{sly}Then you're not trying hard enough!

Introduction: Welcome to Dicey Dungeons, where our contestants|will either win their heart's desire...||{sly}...or end up trapped for ever as my minions!||{normal}Which realistically speaking is much more likely.
Introduction_uk: Welcome to Dicey Dungeons, where our contestants|will either win their heart's desire...||{sly}...or end up trapped for ever as my minions!||{normal}Which realistically speaking is much more likely.

Introduction: Let's welcome back our latest contestant for|another round!||{sly}Once bitten, dice shy!
Introduction_uk: Let's welcome back our latest contestant for|another round!||{sly}Once bitten, dice shy!

Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, where our|contestants' wildest dreams just might come true!||{thinking}Have you paid attention to dreams lately,|by the way?||{normal}I don't dream myself, but I'm told they're terrible.
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons, where our|contestants' wildest dreams just might come true!||{thinking}Have you paid attention to dreams lately,|by the way?||{normal}I don't dream myself, but I'm told they're terrible.

Introduction: Hey there, welcome back to Dicey Dungeons,|where victory is theoretically possible!
Introduction_uk: Hey there, welcome back to Dicey Dungeons,|where victory is theoretically possible!

Introduction: It's time for another episode of Dicey Dungeons,|where contestants risk it all in a doomed attempt|to fulfil their pitiful desires!
Introduction_uk: It's time for another episode of Dicey Dungeons,|where contestants risk it all in a doomed attempt|to fulfil their pitiful desires!

Introduction: Hey again everyone, and welcome back to|Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}As we say here: there's only so long you can|keep trying when you're clearly bound to fail.
Introduction_uk: Hey again everyone, and welcome back to|Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}As we say here: there's only so long you can|keep trying when you're clearly bound to fail.

Introduction: Time for another round - or maybe I should say,|another CUBE!||{sly}Another!||{sly}CUBE!
Introduction_uk: Time for another round - or maybe I should say,|another CUBE!||{sly}Another!||{sly}CUBE!

Introduction: Let's welcome our old friend back to the dungeons!||{thinking}Wait, not friend, the other thing.||{sly}Let's welcome our hapless prisoner|back to the dungeons!
Introduction_uk: Let's welcome our old friend back to the dungeons!||{thinking}Wait, not friend, the other thing.||{sly}Let's welcome our hapless prisoner|back to the dungeons!

Introduction: Let's give a big hand to our latest contestant.||{sly}It's great to see you back, now and for ever!
Introduction_uk: Let's give a big hand to our latest contestant.||{sly}It's great to see you back, now and for ever!

Introduction: Thanks for joining me for another round|of Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Tonight, let's give a big round of cruelly mocking|laughter for our miserable contestant!
Introduction_uk: Thanks for joining me for another round|of Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Tonight, let's give a big round of cruelly mocking|laughter for our miserable contestant!

Introduction: Tonight, on Dicey Dungeons:||we join together to watch an inevitable failure!
Introduction_uk: Tonight, on Dicey Dungeons:||we join together to watch an inevitable failure!

Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Remember, if you'd like to be on the show,|just write to us here at the Dungeons.||Don't forget to whisper your most secret hope|into the envelope!
Introduction_uk: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Remember, if you'd like to be on the show,|just write to us here at the Dungeons.||Don't forget to whisper your most secret hope|into the envelope!

Introduction_uk: Welcome back, my favourite little fighter!||Are you feeling optimistic? Imagining the deep burr|of that monster truck as you speed over the rubble?

Introduction: Let's give a big hand for the Warrior, who's|looking great!||{sly}I guess there's always time to work out when|you're trapped in an endless dungeon.
Introduction_uk: Let's give a big hand for the Warrior, who's|looking great!||{sly}I guess there's always time to work out when|you're trapped in an endless dungeon.

Introduction_uk: Let's welcome the Warrior back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}Some people just don't know when to give up.

Introduction: Ah, it's the Warrior, my lovable buffoon!||Let's give him a round of applause!

Introduction: Let's give a big hand for the Warrior,|my favourite contestant of all!

Introduction_uk: And now, entering battle again - the Warrior!||Who somehow is still trying!

Introduction: Let's give a thunderous round of applause|for the Warrior!||{sly}After all, he used to love thunder,|and he's never gonna hear it again!

Introduction_uk: Let's welcome back my darling little Thief!||{sly}Time to STEAL yourself for another turn|in the dungeons...

Introduction: Let's give a big hand for my favourite crafty Thief!
Introduction_uk: Let's give a big hand for my favourite crafty Thief!

Introduction_uk: Hey everyone! Let's all welcome back the|Jester with a long, silent stare!

Introduction: It's time to welcome back a|treacherous wretch of a Jester!||Join me in quietly watching|their rapid and inevitable failure.
Introduction_uk: It's time to welcome back a|treacherous wretch of a Jester!||Join me in quietly watching|their rapid and inevitable failure.

Introduction: Join us for another round of fun and failure|with the Jester!||{confused}As long-time viewers may recall, the Jester wasn't|always a hideous blight on all that is good and true.||But times change!
Introduction_uk: Join us for another round of fun and failure|with the Jester!||{confused}As long-time viewers may recall, the Jester wasn't|always a hideous blight on all that is good and true.||But times change!

Introduction_uk: Let's silently welcome back the Jester.||{thinking}I wonder how it feels for them to fight the brave|dungeon creatures who for so long were their|friends and allies?

Introduction_uk: Let's give a big round of disappointed|sighs for the Jester!

Introduction: Welcome back to Dicey Dungeons!||{sly}And here's today's contestant, who I guess|we've met before, but who even knows.||{sly}Such an unmemorable little face,|such horrible grabby hands.

Introduction_uk: Let's welcome back to the Dicey Dungeons stage...||{confused}oh, it's you.||{confused}Go fight some monsters, you|grotesque dice-worm.

Introduction_uk: Let's put our hands together for a familiar|face, as one of our favourite little dice|re-enters the Dungeons!

Introduction_uk: Okay everyone, on your feet and give a big|cheer - it's Dungeon time again for one of|our favourite little fighters!

Introduction_uk: This time it's a competitor who escaped once,|but couldn't resist the lure of the Dungeons|for long!||Let's give it up for the return of one of|our reigning champions!

Introduction_uk: A champion returns! But are you fighting fit|or battle weary?||Time to find out as you revisit Diceyyyyy Dungeonssss!

Introduction_uk: Don't change the channel!|This is not a rerun!||Our champ really has come back for another|trip through the Dungeons!
